name: Don't Mind the Trunk
description:
Don't Mind the Trunk Entry for the Castle Game Jam 2016 Twitter: @AergiaGame

Traveling through mysterious dimensions you come upon a small world populated with busy little three legged creatures!

Explore their strange world, find your way around and try to interact with the inhabitants. Find your way to the portal so you can continue your journey.

"Elepigs? Pigaphants? Who knows. Wait, this one looks angry. I wonder what happens if I click on – OH JESUS CHRIST I'VE OPENED ITS HEAD."
– Rock, Paper, Shotgun

 Instructions

Control with W,A,S,D for moving (Q,E for side-stepping) and try clicking on stuff to interact with things and creatures. (Try both mouse buttons!)

(Fixed a few minor control and graphics issues after the jam.)

Credits

Made in Unity for the Castle Game Jam 2016 by Fredrik "Stedden" Stedenfeldt and Kristian Torgard.

Music by:
Martin Barreby
